plugin.name: Translate_Friends
plugin.author: Fiendish
plugin.description: Translates non-English languages spoken on your ftalk into English.

muclient.script:
require "gmcphelper" local translate = require "online_translation" dofile(GetInfo(60) .. "aardwolf_colors.lua")
function print_if_different(original, translated) if original:lower() ~= translated:lower() then print("\""..original.."\" ---- translates to ---> \""..translated.."\"") end end
function OnPluginBroadcast (msg, id, name, text) -- Look for GMCP channel messages. if (id == '3e7dedbe37e44942dd46d264') and (text == "comm.channel") then gmcpcomm = gmcp("comm.channel") player = gmcpcomm.player or "" msg = Trim(strip_colours(gmcpcomm.msg or "")) chan = gmcpcomm.chan or ""
if (player ~= "") and (chan == "ftalk") then -- comm.channel gmcp info injects the player speaking prefix into the message, so first remove it end_of_name = ({msg:find(player..": ")})[2] if end_of_name then msg = msg:sub(end_of_name+1)
-- and remove the surrounding quotation marks if msg:sub(1,1) == "'" then msg = msg:sub(2) end if msg:sub(-1) == "'" then msg = msg:sub(1,-2) end
-- then translate with automatic language detection translate(msg, "auto", "en", print_if_different) end end end end
